languages.text: "Я замечаю боль окружающих, и она заставляет меня действовать".
"I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."
languages.original_text: "Я замечаю боль окружающих, и она заставляет меня действовать".

traits.locale_text: "I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."
"I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."
"I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."
"I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."

languages.text: «Veo el sufrimiento de quienes me rodean, y siento la necesidad de actuar».
languages.original_text: "I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."

traits.locale_text: «Veo el sufrimiento de quienes me rodean, y siento la necesidad de actuar».

languages.text: 「周囲の人々がいかに苦しんでいるのかが見えると、行動を起こしたくなる」
languages.original_text: "I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."

traits.locale_text: 「周囲の人々がいかに苦しんでいるのかが見えると、行動を起こしたくなる」

languages.text: “我看到周围的人受尽磨难，这促使我采取行动。”
languages.original_text: "I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."

traits.locale_text: “我看到周围的人受尽磨难，这促使我采取行动。”

languages.text: « Je vois la souffrance de ceux qui m'entourent et elle me pousse à agir. »
languages.original_text: "I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois la souffrance de ceux qui m'entourent et elle me pousse à agir. »

languages.text: "Ich sehe das Leid aller um mich herum, und es treibt mich an, zu handeln."
languages.original_text: "I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe das Leid aller um mich herum, und es treibt mich an, zu handeln."

languages.text: "Etrafımdakilerin acı çektiğini görüyorum, bu da bir şeyler yapmak için beni harekete geçiriyor."
languages.original_text: "I see the suffering of those around me, and it compels me to act."

traits.locale_text: "Etrafımdakilerin acı çektiğini görüyorum, bu da bir şeyler yapmak için beni harekete geçiriyor."
